aligner.description: [required] choice of aligner: star_salmon, star_rsem, hisat2

gene_bed.description: S3 path to BED file containing gene intervals

fasta.description: [required] S3 path to genome FASTA file

transcript_fasta.description: S3 path to transcript FASTA file

hisat2_build_memory.description: Minimum memory required to use splice sites and exons in the HiSAT2 index build process. default 200 GB

gencode.description: Specify if it is gencode GTF: true, false

additional_fasta.description: S3 path to additional FASTA file: e.g. spike-in sequences

gtf_extra_attributes.description: additional gene identifiers from the input GTF file when running Salmon. default gene_name

gtf_group_features.description: Define the attribute type used to group features in the GTF file when running Salmon. default gene_id

featurecounts_group_type.description: The attribute type used to group feature types in the GTF file when generating the biotype plot with featureCounts. default gene_biotype

featurecounts_feature_type.description: By default, the pipeline assigns reads based on the 'exon' attribute within the GTF file. default exon

save_trimmed.description: save trimmed fastqs in results dir: true, false

extra_trimgalore_args.description: Extra arguments to pass to Trim Galore

extra_fastp_args.description: Extra arguments to pass to fastp command

min_trimmed_reads.description: Minimum number of trimmed reads below which samples are removed from further processing. default 1000

star_ignore_sjdbgtf.description: When using pre-built STAR indices do not re-extract and use splice junctions from the GTF file: true, false

salmon_quant_libtype.description: Override Salmon library type inferred based on strandedness defined in meta object.

extra_star_align_args.description: Extra arguments to pass to STAR alignment command in addition to defaults defined by the pipeline.

save_unaligned.description: Where possible, save unaligned reads from either STAR, HISAT2 or Salmon to the results directory: true, false

rseqc_modules.description: Specify the RSeQC modules to run. default bam_stat,inner_distance

deseq2_vst.description: Use vst transformation instead of rlog with DESeq2. default true: true, false

skip_alignment.description: skip all alignment-based processes: true, false

skip_pseudo_alignment.description: skip all psuedo-alignment-based processes: true, false

skip_bigwig.description: Skip bigWig file creation: true, false

skip_preseq.description: skip preseq. default true: true, false

skip_qc.description: skip all QC steps except for MultiQC: true, false

skip_deseq2_qc.description: Skip DESeq2 PCA and heatmap plotting: true, false

save_merged_fastq.description: save merged fastqs in results dir: true, false

save_reference.description: save aligner index to results directory: true, false

salmon_quant_libtype.description: override salmon inferred lib types: IU, ISR, ISF for paired-end, U, SR, SF for single-end

gtf_group_features.description: attribute type to group features in the GTF when using salmon: gene_id, transcript_id

remove_ribo_rna.description: remove reads from rRNA: true, false
